short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract and display the color scheme of the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Color Extractor is a powerful tool for designers, developers, and anyone who loves colors! It allows you to easily extract the color scheme of any webpage, helping you identify and analyze the colors used in the design.

Key Features:
- Extract all colors from the current webpage
- Categorize colors into intuitive groups (e.g., Red, Blue, Green, etc.)
- Display colors in a clean and organized popup
- Copy color codes (HEX) with a single click
- Support for both light and dark themes

Why Use Web Color Extractor?
- Save time by quickly identifying the color palette of any website
- Get inspiration for your own designs
- Improve accessibility by analyzing color contrast
- Perfect for designers, developers, and color enthusiasts

Install Web Color Extractor today and unlock the power of colors on the web!
